subject: Basketball
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Bobby Dulin a former University of Connecticut player, faces up to two years in prison after pleading no contest to sexually assaulting a teenage girl in Milford, Conn. Prosecutors said Dulin, 49, who is married, used to coach the girl on a youth basketball team and had a three-year affair with her beginning when she was 16. She is now 20 and attends a college in Massachusetts.
